member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Client.MergeOption
member.summary: Describes the synchronization option for sending or receiving entity data to or from a data service using the .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Client.MergeOption.AppendOnly
member.summary: New Microsoft Dynamics 365 entities are appended. Existing entities or their original values are not be modified. No client-side changes are lost in this merge. This is the default behavior. Value = 0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Client.MergeOption.NoTracking
member.summary: Microsoft Dynamics 365 entities are always loaded from persisted storage. Any attribute changes made to entities in the are overwritten by the data source values. Value = 3.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Client.MergeOption.OverwriteChanges
member.summary: All current values on the client are overwritten with current values from the Web service regardless of whether they have been changed on the client. Value = 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Client.MergeOption.PreserveChanges
member.summary: Current values that have been changed on the client are not modified, but any unchanged values are updated with current values from the Web service. No client-side changes are lost in this merge. Value = 2.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.ConcurrencyBehavior
member.summary: Contains values to indicate the optimistic concurrency behavior that should be applied when performing entity update and delete operations.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.ConcurrencyBehavior.AlwaysOverwrite
member.summary: Specifies the behavior where an update or delete operation is applied without regard to the version of the record in the database. Value = 2. If optimistic concurrency is not enabled for the target entity, the AlwaysOverwrite behavior is applied.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.ConcurrencyBehavior.Default
member.summary: Specifies to use the default behavior. Value = 0. The default value is also used if no value is set in the ConcurrencyBehavior property of the request. The meaning of “default” is interpreted differently based on the calling context.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.ConcurrencyBehavior.IfRowVersionMatches
member.summary: Specifies the behavior where an update or delete operation is only applied if the entity record in the database has the same row version as the entity or entity reference in the request. Value = 1. If no row version value is provided on the entity or entity references in the request, the request fails immediately.
